text: I traced the Circus whose gray stones incline%% Where Rome and dim Etruria interjoin,
Where Rome and dim Etruria interjoin, Till came a child who showed an ancient coin
Till came a child who showed an ancient coin%% That bore the image of a Constantine.
That bore the image of a Constantine. She lightly passed; nor did she once opine
She lightly passed; nor did she once opine%% How, better than all books, she had raised for me
How, better than all books, she had raised for me%% In swift perspective Europe's history
In swift perspective Europe's history%% Through the vast years of Caesar's sceptred line.
Through the vast years of Caesar's sceptred line. For in my distant plot of English loam
For in my distant plot of English loam%% 'Twas but to delve, and straightway there to find
'Twas but to delve, and straightway there to find%% Coins of like impress.  As with one half blind
Coins of like impress.  As with one half blind%% Whom common simples cure, her act flashed home
Whom common simples cure, her act flashed home%% In that mute moment to my opened mind
In that mute moment to my opened mind%% The power, the pride, the reach of perished Rome.
